title: RSS workers did not dance after England won the ICC World Cup 2019. It’s an old video
subtitle: According to the original news story, the video was taken in 2015 when RSS workers danced before a meeting at the RSS Headquarters in Nagpur.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of dancing RSS workers is being shared on Facebook with a claim that they were dancing on the occasion of England winning the ICC World Cup 2019. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post.

In the video, the logo of ‘India TV’ can be seen at the bottom right. So, when searched with the keywords ‘RSS workers dance India TV’ on Google, a link to an India TV video uploaded on YouTube in 2015 can be found in the search results. According to the original news story, the video was taken in 2015 when RSS workers danced before a meeting at the RSS Headquarters in Nagpur. So, the video is not at all related to England’s 2019 ICC World Cup win.

To sum it up, RSS workers did not dance after England won the ICC World Cup 2019. It’s an old video.
